```
(module
  (func $twos_complement (export "twos_complement")
  (param $number i32)
  (result i32)
    local.get $number
  1 i32.const 0xffffffff  ;; all binary 1s to flip the bits
  2 i32.xor               ;; flip all the bits
    i32.const 1
 3 i32.add             ;; add one after flipping all bits for 2s complement
  )
)
```
